kTutorial_01_Text4
Hold |R2| to accelerate. Use the |Left Stick| to navigate. The |Right Stick| controls the camera.
Tenez |R2| s'accélérer. Utilisez l'| Stick Gauche | à naviguer. L'| Stick Droit | contrôle la caméra.
Halten |R2| zu beschleunigen. Bei Verwendung des | Left Stick | zu navigieren. Die | Right Stick | die Kamera steuert.
Tenere |R2| per accelerare. Utilizzare l'| Sinistra Bastone | per navigare. L'| levetta destra | controlla la fotocamera.
Sostenga |R2| acelerándose. Utilice el | Manual Izquierda | para navegar. El | stick derecho | controla la cámara.

kPreviewMissionDescription

This is a limited demo mode of Emo Ray. It is free to play for one hour, and will then become unavailable. Purchase 'Emo Ray - Volume One' at the kiosk outside of the garage to unlock full, unrestricted access!

Il s'agit d'un mode de démonstration limitée de Emo Ray. Il est libre de jouer pendant une heure, et deviendra alors disponible. 'Emo Ray - Volume One' achat au kiosque à l'extérieur du garage pour débloquer le plein accès, sans restriction!

Dies ist eine limitierte Demo-Modus von Emo Ray. Es ist kostenlos für eine Stunde zu spielen, und dann nicht mehr zur Verfügung. Kauf 'Emo Ray - Volume One' am Kiosk außerhalb der Garage zu entsperren vollen, uneingeschränkten Zugang!

Si tratta di una modalità demo limitata di Emo Ray. E 'libero di giocare per un'ora, e poi non sono più disponibili. 'Emo Ray - Volume One' acquisto presso il chiosco di fuori del garage per sbloccare completa, accesso illimitato!

Este es un modo de demostración limitada de Emo Ray. Es libre para jugar durante una hora, y luego dejará de estar disponible. 'Emo Ray - Volume One' Compra en el quiosco fuera del garaje para desbloquear el acceso pleno y sin restricciones!

This is a limited demo mode of Emo Ray. It is free to play for one hour, and will then become unavailable. Purchase 'Emo Ray - Volume One' at the kiosk outside of the garage to unlock full, unrestricted access!

This is a limited demo mode of Emo Ray. It is free to play for one hour, and will then become unavailable. Purchase 'Emo Ray - Volume One' at the kiosk outside of the garage to unlock full, unrestricted access!
We hope you enjoy this free-to-play mode! When you're ready to give the full game a shot, head over to the kiosk outside of the garage to purchase. Thanks for playing!

We hope you enjoy this free-to-play mode! When you're ready to give the full game a shot, head over to the kiosk outside of the garage to purchase. Thanks for playing!
kEp01Ch01MissionDescription
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
L'attaque a commencé! Les ours font leur apparition partout dans la ville, et votre ami pour la vie Porsche est en difficulté. Dépêchez-vous à son secours!
Der Angriff hat begonnen! Bären sind ganz über der Stadt, und Ihr langjähriger Freund Porsche ist in Schwierigkeiten. Beeilen Sie zu ihrer Rettung!
L'attacco è iniziato! Orsi appaiono in tutta la città, e il tuo amico per tutta la vita Porsche è in difficoltà. Affrettatevi a salvarla!
El ataque ha comenzado! Los osos están apareciendo por toda la ciudad, y su amigo de toda la vida Porsche está en problemas. Date prisa a su rescate!
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
The attack has begun! Bears are appearing all over the city, and your lifelong friend Porsche is in trouble. Hurry to her rescue!
kEp01Ch02MissionDescription
Putting her skills to the test, Porsche has constructed a new weapon: the Cow Catcher! Head into the city and try out her latest creation.
En mettant ses compétences à l'épreuve, Porsche a construit une nouvelle arme: le Catcher vache! Dirigez-vous vers la ville et essayer sa dernière création.
The Cow Catcher: Legte ihre Fähigkeiten auf die Probe, hat Porsche eine neue Waffe gebaut! Leiter in die Stadt und versuchen, ihre neueste Kreation.
Mettere le sue abilità alla prova, Porsche ha costruito una nuova arma: il Catcher Cow! Dirigetevi verso la città e provare la sua ultima creazione.
Poner sus habilidades a prueba, Porsche ha construido una nueva arma: el Catcher vaca! Entra en la ciudad y probar su última creación.
Putting her skills to the test, Porsche has constructed a new weapon: the Cow Catcher! Head into the city and try out her latest creation.
Putting her skills to the test, Porsche has constructed a new weapon: the Cow Catcher! Head into the city and try out her latest creation.
Putting her skills to the test, Porsche has constructed a new weapon: the Cow Catcher! Head into the city and try out her latest creation.

Putting her skills to the test, Porsche has constructed a new weapon: the Cow Catcher! Head into the city and try out her latest creation.
Putting her skills to the test, Porsche has constructed a new weapon: the Cow Catcher! Head into the city and try out her latest creation.
kEp01Ch03MissionDescription
Chopper, one of your good friends, is in grave danger! It seems that the bears are becoming more aggressive. Can you find him before it's too late?
Chopper, l'un de vos bons amis, est en grand danger! Il semble que les ours sont de plus en plus agressive. Pouvez-vous le trouver avant qu'il ne soit trop tard?
Chopper, einer der guten Freunde, ist in großer Gefahr! Es scheint, dass die Bären werden immer aggressiver. Können Sie ihn finden, bevor es zu spät ist?
Chopper, uno dei tuoi buoni amici, è in grave pericolo! Sembra che gli orsi sono sempre più aggressivi. Riesci a trovarlo prima che sia troppo tardi?
Chopper, uno de sus buenos amigos, está en grave peligro! Parece que los osos son cada vez más agresivo. ¿Puedes encontrarlo antes de que sea demasiado tarde?
Chopper, one of your good friends, is in grave danger! It seems that the bears are becoming more aggressive. Can you find him before it's too late?
Chopper, one of your good friends, is in grave danger! It seems that the bears are becoming more aggressive. Can you find him before it's too late?
Chopper, one of your good friends, is in grave danger! It seems that the bears are becoming more aggressive. Can you find him before it's too late?

Chopper, one of your good friends, is in grave danger! It seems that the bears are becoming more aggressive. Can you find him before it's too late?
kEp01Ch04MissionDescription
Chopper's Sonic Weapon is hooked up and ready to go. Will it be enough to emerge victorious from the coming battle?
Arme Sonic Chopper est branché et prêt à partir. Sera-ce suffisant pour sortir victorieux de la bataille à venir?
Chopper Sonic Waffe ist und süchtig bereit zu gehen. Wird es genug, um gestärkt aus der kommenden Schlacht gewinnen?
Arma di Sonic Chopper è collegato e pronto a partire. Sarà sufficiente per uscire vittoriosi dalla battaglia a venire?
Arma sónica de Chopper está conectado y listo para funcionar. ¿Será suficiente para salir victorioso de la batalla que se avecina?
Chopper's Sonic Weapon is hooked up and ready to go. Will it be enough to emerge victorious from the coming battle?
Chopper's Sonic Weapon is hooked up and ready to go. Will it be enough to emerge victorious from the coming battle?

kEp02Ch01MissionDescription
As Chopper hones in on your mother's cell phone, Porsche wants to see how the battle against the bears is progressing. Use your new minigun to turn the tide in your favor!

Comme aiguise Chopper dans le téléphone portable de votre mère, Porsche veut voir comment la lutte contre les ours se poursuit. Utilisez votre minigun nouveau pour inverser la tendance en votre faveur!
Als Chopper schärft in deiner Mutter das Handy, will Porsche zu sehen, wie der Kampf gegen die Bären voran. Verwenden Sie Ihre neue Minigun, um die Flut zu Ihren Gunsten drehen!
Come affina Chopper in sul cellulare di tua madre, Porsche vuole vedere come la battaglia contro gli orsi è in corso. Utilizzare il nuovo minigun di invertire la tendenza a tuo favore!
Como Chopper archivos en el teléfono celular de su madre, Porsche quiere ver cómo la batalla contra los osos y está progresando. Utilice su minigun nuevo para cambiar el rumbo a su favor!
As Chopper hones in on your mother's cell phone, Porsche wants to see how the battle against the bears is progressing. Use your new minigun to turn the tide in your favor!
As Chopper hones in on your mother's cell phone, Porsche wants to see how the battle against the bears is progressing. Use your new minigun to turn the tide in your favor!

kEp02Ch02MissionDescription
The only way your father could get the minigun was for him to offer your assistance to the military. Do your duty! Help them strengthen their presence in the area.
La seule manière que votre père ne pouvait obtenir le minigun pour lui offrir votre aide à l'armée. Faites votre devoir! Les aider à renforcer leur présence dans la région.
Der einzige Weg, dein Vater die Minigun bekommen konnte, war für ihn Ihre Unterstützung für das Militär bieten. Tun Sie Ihre Pflicht! Helfen Sie ihnen, stärken ihre Präsenz in der Region.
L'unico modo tuo padre potrebbe ottenere il minigun era per lui a offrire il vostro aiuto ai militari. Fate il vostro dovere! Aiutarli a rafforzare la loro presenza sul territorio.
La única manera que su padre podía conseguir la ametralladora fue para él ofrecer su ayuda a los militares. Cumple con tu deber! Ayuda a fortalecer su presencia en la zona.
The only way your father could get the minigun was for him to offer your assistance to the military. Do your duty! Help them strengthen their presence in the area.

kEp02Ch03MissionDescription
Deterred by the Sergeant's power play, Chopper is no longer able to work on the recording. Help him figure out a faster way to track down your mother.
Dissuadés par jeu de puissance du sergent, Chopper n'est plus en mesure de travailler sur l'enregistrement. Aidez-le à trouver un moyen plus rapide de retrouver votre mère.
Abgeschreckt von der Sergeant Macht spielen, ist Chopper nicht mehr in der Lage, auf der Aufnahme zu arbeiten. Helfen Sie ihm, herauszufinden, einen schnelleren Weg, um die Spur zu deiner Mutter.
Scoraggiati dal gioco di potere del sergente, Chopper non è più in grado di lavorare sulla registrazione. Aiutarlo a trovare un modo più veloce per rintracciare sua madre.
Disuadidos por juego de poder del sargento, Chopper ya no es capaz de trabajar en la grabación. Ayúdale a encontrar una manera más rápida de localizar a su madre.
Deterred by the Sergeant's power play, Chopper is no longer able to work on the recording. Help him figure out a faster way to track down your mother.

kEp02Ch04MissionDescription
Chopper has betrayed you! He now commands a fleet of UFOs heading for your location. Destroy the fleet before they wipe out the city!
Chopper vous a trahi! Il détient maintenant une flotte d'ovnis rubrique de votre région. Détruisez la flotte avant de disparaître de la ville!
Chopper hat dich verraten! Er hat jetzt kommandiert eine Flotte von UFOs Überschrift für Ihren Standort. Zerstöre die Flotte, bevor sie die Stadt wischen!
Chopper ti ha tradito! Egli comanda ora una flotta di UFO voce per la posizione. Distruggi la flotta prima di spazzare via la città!
Chopper te ha traicionado! Ahora manda una flota de OVNIs se dirigían a su ubicación. Destruir la flota antes de que acabar con la ciudad!
Chopper has betrayed you! He now commands a fleet of UFOs heading for your location. Destroy the fleet before they wipe out the city!

kEp01Obj01MissionDescription
Porsche and Hammy have driven you away with their incessant arguing. Can you find a quiet, relaxing place somwhere in this bear-infested city?
Porsche et Hammy avez-vous chassé de leur argumentation incessante. Pouvez-vous trouver un endroit calme, somwhere lieu de détente dans cette ville infestée d'ours?
Porsche und Hammy haben Sie vertrieben mit ihren unaufhörlichen Streitereien. Können Sie einen ruhigen, entspannenden Ort irgendwo in diesem Bären-verseuchten Stadt?
Porsche e Hammy hai scacciato con la loro litigi incessante. Riesci a trovare una tranquilla, rilassante somwhere posto in questo bear-infestato città?
Porsche y Hammy has echado con su argumentando incesante. ¿Puedes encontrar un somwhere tranquilo, relajante lugar en esta ciudad infestada de oso?

kEp01Obj02MissionDescription
You mother's kidnapping is starting to take its toll on your father. Through whatever means necessary, find a way to relieve him of his stress.
Vous enlèvement mère commence à faire sentir ses effets sur votre père. Par tous les moyens nécessaires, trouver un moyen de le soulager de son stress.
Deine Mutter Entführung beginnt, seinen Tribut von deinem Vater zu nehmen. Durch welchen Mitteln notwendig, einen Weg finden, ihn von seinem Stress abzubauen.
È rapimento della madre sta iniziando a farsi sentire a tuo padre. Attraverso tutti i mezzi necessari, trovare un modo per alleviare lui il suo stress.
Secuestro Tu madre está empezando a pasar factura a su padre. A través de cualquier medio necesario, encontrar una manera de aliviar su estrés.
You mother's kidnapping is starting to take its toll on your father. Through whatever means necessary, find a way to relieve him of his stress.

kEp01Obj03MissionDescription
Trapped in a dream, you wonder aimlessly from memory to memory. Are you reliving your past? Are your fantasies becoming real? Or are malefic visions haunting you?
Piégé dans un rêve, vous vous demandez sans but de mémoire à mémoire. Êtes-vous revivre votre passé? Sont vos fantasmes devenir réalité? Ou sont les visions maléfiques qui vous hante?
Gefangen in einem Traum, fragt man sich ziellos von Speicher zu Speicher. Sind Sie Nacherleben Ihrer Vergangenheit? Sind Ihre Fantasien zu real? Oder malefic Visionen verfolgt dich?
Intrappolato in un sogno, ti chiedi senza meta dalla memoria alla memoria. Sei rivivere il tuo passato? Le vostre fantasie diventare reale? Oppure visioni malefiche si aggira?
Atrapado en un sueño, te preguntas sin rumbo de memoria a la memoria. ¿Está reviviendo su pasado? ¿Sus fantasías convertirse en real? ¿O visiones maléficas que atormenta?

kEp02Obj02MissionDescription
In the calm before the storm, Porsche has decided that a vehicle check-up is in order. Complete the random objectives given to you and earn mod points!
Dans le calme avant la tempête, Porsche a décidé qu'un véhicule check-up est en ordre. Remplir les objectifs qui vous sont donnés au hasard et gagner des points mod!
In der Ruhe vor dem Sturm, hat Porsche entschieden, dass ein Fahrzeug, um Check-up. Führen Sie die zufällige Ziele, die Ihnen und verdienen mod Punkte!
Nella calma prima della tempesta, Porsche ha deciso che un veicolo check-up è in ordine. Completa gli obiettivi casuali dato a voi e guadagnare punti mod!
En la calma antes de la tormenta, Porsche ha decidido que un vehículo chequeo está en orden. Completar los objetivos que le ha asignado al azar y ganar puntos mod!

kTutorial01MissionDescription
Sergeant McMillan has taken you under his wing, and is instructing you on the proper operation of your vehicle. It's time to learn the basics!
Sergent McMillan vous a pris sous son aile, et vous instruire sur le bon fonctionnement de votre véhicule. Il est temps d'apprendre les rudiments!
Sergeant McMillan hat Sie unter seine Fittiche genommen, und fordert Sie auf den ordnungsgemäßen Betrieb Ihres Fahrzeugs. Es ist Zeit, um die Grundlagen zu erlernen!
Sergente McMillan ti ha preso sotto la sua ala, e ti sta insegnando il corretto funzionamento del veicolo. E 'tempo di imparare le basi!
Sargento McMillan le ha tomado bajo su ala, y se le instruye en el correcto funcionamiento de su vehículo. Es hora de aprender lo básico!

kTutorial02MissionDescription
Having successfully completed the first training exercise, you are now ready to handle more dangerous environments. Harness the extreme power of the many weapons of Emo Ray!

Après avoir terminé avec succès le premier exercice d'entraînement, vous êtes maintenant prêt à gérer les environnements les plus dangereux. Profitez de la puissance extrême des nombreuses armes d'Emo Ray!
Nach erfolgreichem Abschluss der ersten Übung abgeschlossen ist, sind Sie nun bereit, mehr zu gefährlichen Umgebungen zu behandeln. Nutzen Sie die extreme Kraft der vielen Waffen Emo Ray!
Dopo aver completato con successo il primo esercizio di formazione, si è pronti a gestire ambienti più pericolosi. Sfrutta la potenza estrema delle molte armi di Emo Ray!

Después de haber completado con éxito el ejercicio de entrenamiento en primer lugar, que ahora está listo para manejar entornos más peligrosos. Aproveche la potencia extrema de las muchas armas de Emo Ray!

Funziona generando attività casuali per completare. A seconda di come si gestisce l'attività, è in grado di giudicare quali aree dobbiamo lavorare.
